title: Huge 2 Bedroom with Parking in Olde Kensington/Northern Liberties
description:
Take advantage of this opportunity to rent this beautiful 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom unit, perfectly suited for entertaining, with designated parking. This well-maintained newer construction condo is sure to impress! Enter this main floor unit from 5th Street through a shared entryway.
Located on this level you will find a bedroom with ample closet space, spacious 3-piece hall bath, and coat closet. The heart of this unit is the open kitchen with stainless steel appliances, two toned cabinetry, subway tile backsplash, with white granite countertops that provide counter seating.
The large living/dining room combo offers rear access to your assigned parking located directly outside your back door (utilize the outside outlet to charge your electric car). The lower level provides extra living space, storage, laundry room and over-sized primary suite with full bath offering a walk-in glass door shower and a double-sink vanity. Throughout the unit you will find hardwood floors, high ceilings, recessed lighting, and large windows that provide ample natural light.
An on-site community dog park is available for residents to make time with their furry family members an added luxury. Perfectly located within walking distance of all the fantastic dining, nightlife, coffee shops, boutique & name brand shopping that Northern Liberties, Fishtown and Olde Kensington areas have to offer… the Piazza, Jerry’s Bar, Standard Tap, Johnny Brenda’s, Frankford Hall, Fette Sau, La Colombe, Suraya, Evil Genius, Human Robot, and Suttons. title: Brand new renovation 3BD/1.5BTH House for rent
description: This 3-Bedroom 1-1/2-Bathroom Home is located on a quiet, tree-lined street in Norristown. With easy access to Main Street and plenty of shops, restaurants, and entertainment, you will absolutely love this location! This home is available NOW and ready for immediate move-in! Enter the home and fall in love with the spacious living room complete with wide-plank flooring that gives the appearance of beautiful hardwood flooring. There is a large window which allows tons of natural light to pour in and make the entire space feel incredibly open and bright! The living room is located directly off of the kitchen which is perfect for when you're entertaining guests or hosting holidays. The kitchen has been completely renovated and looks absolutely stunning. It includes white shaker-style cabinets with dark hardware, granite countertops, stainless steel refrigerator and four-burner gas range. The kitchen is large enough to accommodate a moveable island or a four-seat dining set if you'd like to create an eat-in kitchen! There is also an opening into the living room which makes both spaces feel connected. This home includes four bedrooms which is very rare to find! They vary in size but every bedroom is large enough to accommodate at least a full-sized bed and complete bedroom set with ease. They also include the same wide-plank flooring that is seen on the first floor of the home! There are one and a half bathrooms in the house and they are equally stunning. They have both been renovated and include high-end features throughout! The first bathroom in particular has a full-sized bathtub/shower with an incredible tile surround that feels like having a spa inside your own home! In addition to all of the great features throughout the home, there is also a walkout basement that goes out to a large backyard which is perfect for outdoor games, hosting barbecues, or just enjoying some fresh air! There is certainly no shortage of space throughout this property. Conveniently located in Norristown by the Schuylkill River and a mile away from Bridgeport. Easy access to the Norristown Transportation Center, I-76, I-476, Rt. 202, Rt. 30, Rt. 422, and all the beauty Montgomery County has to offer!
